name: Button Pushing Facility | DEMO
description:
Button Pressing Facility is a game about pushing buttons.  Big, Red buttons, to be precise.  Also, it's kinda mooched off of portal... ALSO, there may or may not be an epic cutscene at the end of the demo...

Disclaimer:  This is an EARLY ACCESS DEMO.  That means that the demo isn't even finished.  It's more of a showcase.  This game may or may not come out later.

  • WASD to Move
  • SPACE to jump
  • LEFT CLICK to shoot (there will be a purpose for this in the full demo)
  • E to pick up the cube
